library(dplyr)


# Reading the CSV files with specific column types
dataa <- read.csv(file = 'C:\\Users\\timothy\\OneDrive\\Documents\\temp\\base.csv', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
datab <- read.csv(file = 'C:\\Users\\timothy\\OneDrive\\Documents\\temp\\humi_narc_07052024.csv', stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

# Ensure start date and end date columns are treated as strings
dataa$start_date <- as.character(dataa$start_date)
dataa$end_date <- as.character(dataa$end_date)

# Performing a full join to keep all cases from both files
df <- full_join(dataa, datab, by = "CEO_ID")

# Writing the merged data to a CSV file
write.csv(df, "C:\\Users\\timothy\\OneDrive\\Documents\\temp\\merged.csv", na = '', row.names = FALSE)
rm(list=ls())
